OpenBGPD Mirrors

OpenBGPD 8.7 portable: released Dec 17th, 2024

This is a port of OpenBGPD to other operating systems. It is based on portability code from the OpenNTPD, OpenSSH, and LibreSSL portable projects.

Platform Requirements

At the time of writing OpenBGPD portable is known to build and work on:

  • OpenBSD
  • Linux
  • FreeBSD

OpenBGPD may work on other operating systems. Reports (success or otherwise) are welcome. You may report bugs or submit pull requests at the GitHub project.

Signing

OpenBGPD portable releases are signed with a signify(1) public key:

RWTGJEPobKfXIP1+foh6O3ZGQIDIxwB0Hp4rH6fMYGdYPQMFH2IEqxcY

They are co-signed with GPG using this public key. (BA3DA14FEE657A6D7931C08EC755429BA6A969A8)

  • HTTP mirrors
  • FTP mirrors
  • RSYNC mirrors
